name: STyphiInfectionOrganismOrSubstanceInLabResults
title: S. Typhi Infection (Organism or Substance in Lab Results)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains organism names or substances associated with S. Typhi Infection.),(Data Element Scope: Organism names or substances reported in laboratory results),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Salmonella typhi (organism); 
Nucleic acid and antigen substances),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
